Text: RE May Church Gourmet Cajun DinnerMay I volunteer for the cornbread Thanks Anne Hutson Original Message From SMTP Sent Wednesday May PM To Subject May Church Gourmet Cajun Dinner I look forward to having you all as guests for an evening of Cajun cooking at my home on Saturday May at pm Some of us I wont name names are hoping we might even have enough time to play a wicked game of African Uno Below is the list of the individuals attending the dinner at my home and attached below are the recipes for the evening I will provide beer wine and soft drinks In addition I will make a big pot of white rice to go with the Red Beans Rice Shrimp Etouffe Please let me know as soon as possible which recipe you would prefer to prepare Laura Johnson Charles and Janice Thompson John Hagood Ann Hutson Henry and Alicia Goodrow Beryl and Ray Mack Tana Jones The directions to my house are as follows Take to the Greenbriar exit like you are going to Church Make a right on Greenbriar Quickly get into the left lane because you will have to make the first left possible onto a street called Milford Then make a left onto Shepherd you need to go back one street in the opposite direction The first right will be Banks Street it is the street right next to the freeway On Banks go past the first stop sign I will be the or th house on the left a taupe colored ivy covered cottage Banks My phone number is See attached file Church Gourmet doc File Church Gourmet doc
